questions.questionText: How does the RescueRadar RescueRadar work?
questions.answer: The RescueRadar is a plug and play, installed in the company's computers.

questions.questionText: Does the RescueRadar require internet to work?
questions.answer: Yes, without internet the RescueRadar will not work.

questions.questionText: Who has access  to make changes in RescueRadar?
questions.answer: RescueRadar is connected to the administrator's computer through a server. The administrator has full access to make changes to RescueRadar, while supervisors have limited access, preventing them from making major changes.

questions.questionText: What occurs if there is loadshedding while the app is running?
questions.answer: The device will not work during loadshedding but the app will , if there is an uninterrupted power supply and internet connection available as it requires internet to work.

questions.questionText: How do I log into RescueRadar?
questions.answer: You can log into RescueRadar by clicking on the login button after entering your email and password

questions.questionText: How do I reset RescueRadar password?
questions.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on the forgot password link on the login page

questions.questionText: How accurate is the miner tracking system??
questions.answer: The miner tracking system is very accurate, with locating a miner approximately 20 metres from an access point.

questions.questionText: What should I do when a panic button is accidently pressed ?
questions.answer: The admin at the control room will get an alert and verify the emergency with the supervisor assigned to that mine shaft, if it is a false alarm the admin will cancel the emergency

tutorial.questionText: How do I turn of sound alerts?
tutorial.answerText: Dashboard > Settings > Scroll Downs > Toggle Sound Alerts
